dict.acceptation: 小孩，孩子；幼稚的人；产物；弟子；

sent.orig: The word child is of common gender.
The difference of PAB between Child-Pugh A and healthy group was statistically significant(P<0.01).
sent.trans: PAB在Child-PughA组与正常组比较差异有显著性(P<001)。

sent.orig: One-child fee divided into one-child parents incentive fees and only-child family payments.
sent.trans: 独生子女费分为独生子女父母奖励费和独生子女家庭补助费。

sent.orig: The child archetype often blends with other archetypes to form the child-god, or the child-hero.
sent.trans: 小孩原型通常和其他原型混合以形成丘比特。

sent.orig: Child's language, child psychology, childhood, Interesting, you can not help laughing.
sent.trans: 孩子的语言，孩子的心理，童真、童趣，会让你情不自禁笑出声来。
